channel.title: Latest ditz updates for Wordprss
channel.description: Latest updates to the distributed issue tracker for Wordprss

item.description: ditz close wordprss-30 doh! finally did it. Have to JSON.parse the response. DUH have to check that the true/false I'm passing to backend gets interpreted properly DUH

item.title: Matt Katz <ditz@morelightmorelight.com> created hateoas for backend and frontend
Matt Katz <ditz@morelightmorelight.com> commented Add NONCE and Permission valdation to ajax calls
item.description: Ok - so looks like we should add a nonce per ACTION. That way we can be sure user is performing the action they intend. Also hearing that wordpress lets you use nonce more than once, which is confusing.
